name: Glass City
description:
GLASS CITY is set in a dystopian future world where corporations have enslaved the citizens to work themselves to death while enriching themselves.  You play as The Glass Man and have to save the citizens from the Corporate Overlords.

The art style is minimalistic and intentionally creates the feeling of entrapment and coldness.

Note: The game is suitable for all ages.

Thanks, Mafuta Games
